Auction House Manager Anita:
Nice to meet you, Adventurer. I'm an Auction House Manager from Aden Kingdom. You want to know about the Auction House?
Simply put, you can come here to buy any registered item tht can be found throughout the continent. Of course, if there's anything you want to sell, you can register that item here as well.
Just pay a small commission when registering an item. Additionally, a commission will be automatically deducted whenever a transaction takes place.
So, how about it? Would you like to try it out?
